name: Holy sheep !
description:
This is a prototype for the PerpetualJam of July 2018.

The game

In 100 days, the Great Fair will take place in town. As a shepherd, your goal is to bring as many rainbow sheep as possible to this event.

Each turn, you can pick an action between "Feed", "Breed" and "Trade". Feeding a sheep with a flower will change its color. 

Every 7 days, a random event occurs.

Good luck, shepherd !
